DataElement.preferredName: Right Arm Wrist Joint Circumference Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the circumference measurement at the right arm wrist joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Right Arm Wrist Joint Circumference Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the right side of the body.:A joint between the distal end of the radius and the proximal row of carpal bones._The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the right side of the body.

Concepts.definition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the right side of the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: A joint between the distal end of the radius and the proximal row of carpal bones. (NCI):The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
